rules.rationale: WHI Osteoporosis substudy DXA scans. Three tables: bmdhip_rel2 (24 vars, hip scan — HIPAREA/HIPBMC/HIPBMD), bmdspine_rel2 (20 vars, spine scan — SPNAREA/SPNBMC/SPNBMD), bmdwbody_rel2 (68 vars, whole body — WBAREA/WBBMC/WBBMD/WBFAT). No non-DXA tables share the 'bmd' prefix.
rules.description: 'Bone Densitometry (BMD) Hip/Spine/Whole Body Scan data file. The BMD data files include results from the DXA scans performed at the Clinical Centers participating in the WHI Osteoporosis substudy.'

rules.rationale: ecg_rel2 (652 vars) contains raw ECG measurements across all 12 leads: BPA_I through BPA_V6 (P-wave amplitudes), BPI (intervals), ATR_FIBR/ATR_FLUT (rhythm), ACEPT_RR (R-R interval). This is device-level ECG data. Note: ecg_mi_nova_rel1 (10 vars) is a Novacode MI outcomes table (ECGPOSMI, ECGSILNTMI) and is correctly excluded by this regex.
rules.description: 'Electrocardiogram (ECG) - Myocardial Infarction (MI) Novacode Follow-Up Results data file'
